mapper.insert: INSERT INTO series SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, cateId = #{cateId}, `name` = #{name};
mapper.select: SELECT S.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, C.name AS extra__cateName FROM series AS S INNER JOIN `Member` AS M INNER JOIN category AS C ON M.id = S.memberId AND S.cateId = C.id AND S.memberId = #{memberId} AND S.displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY S.id DESC;
SELECT S.* FROM series AS S INNER JOIN `Article` AS A ON A.seriesId = S.id AND A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.id = #{articleId}
